content: and attach them to the front loops of row 5 and 6 *for the brushy part of the tail please see the instruction picture on the baby cow spots i didn t write down this cow s spots but you can crochet same as baby cow for bigger pieces just crochet an extra row or two and just increase randomly now just sew everything together as on the picture stuff the nose when there is only small hole left when you sew weave in the ends cut remaining tails and enjoy your new plushie  patterns by kasia ławniczak you can email me at mouse6@wp pl instagram craftykathie *these are my own patterns i share them with you for free please do not sell my pattern as your own you can freely crochet and sell the crocheted plushies if you need any help with this pattern go ahead and ask me i ll answer as soon as i can
